          <title>
            <string language="sl">Odpiranje, brisanje in preimenovanje dokumenta</string>
            <string language="en">Opening, deleting and renaming document</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dokument öffnen, löschend und umbenennend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ouvrant, effaçant et renommant le document</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abrindo, suprimindo e rebatizando o original</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aprendo, cancellando e cambiando titolo 
documento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανοίγοντας, διαγράφοντας και μετονομάζοντας το έγγραφο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Abriendo, suprimiendo y retitulando el documento</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec zna odpreti, brisati in preimenovati dokument. Učenec zna upravljati z dokumenti.</string>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan on teaching basic operations with documents - opening, deleting, renaming.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">microsoft word</string>
            <string language="en">microsoft word</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">word processor</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">preimenovanje</string>
            <string language="en">renaming</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan auf dem Unterrichten der 
grundlegenden Operationen mit Dokumenten - Öffnung, Löschen, 
benennend um.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon sur enseigner des exécutions de 
base avec des documents - ouverture, effacer, renommant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição em ensinar operações básicas
com os originais - abertura, suprimir, rebatizando.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione sull'istruzione dei

cambiante titolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος για τη διδασκαλία των βασικών 
διαδικασιών με τα έγγραφα - άνοιγμα, διαγραφή, να μετονομάσει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección en la enseñanza de 
operaciones básicas con los documentos - apertura, el suprimir, 
retitulando.</string>
